attributes.action: Scrap the second home `Perk`for ALL members of Parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Id like to see the Second home perk for all MPs scraped.Ordinary families are loosing their homes.and the members of Parliment are living off our backs,

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
